Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Life Records" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(February 2024)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Record label **Hup Hup Sdn Bhd**, [doing business as](/wiki/Trade_name) **Life Records**, is a Malaysian [record label](/wiki/Record_label) founded in 1949. It has subsidiaries in [Hong Kong](/wiki/British_Hong_Kong) which founded in 1960 and [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) which founded in 1966. ## History According to the company itself it was officially established based in [Malaya](/wiki/Federation_of_Malaya) on 1949; 77 years ago (1949) as **King's Musical Industrial Sdn Bhd**, **King's Musical Industries Limited** and **Hup Hup Sdn Bhd**. Subsidiaries in [British Hong Kong](/wiki/British_Hong_Kong) (The Life Records Limited ([Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 麗風唱片有限公司)) was officially established based in [Hong Kong](/wiki/British_Hong_Kong) on 1960; 66 years ago (1960) and [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) (Life Record Industries Pte Ltd ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 丽风唱片工业（私人）有限公司)) was officially established based in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) on 1966; 60 years ago (1966), according to the company. According to the company it was the first [Malaya](/wiki/Federation_of_Malaya)–[Hong Kong](/wiki/British_Hong_Kong)–[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) licensee for international record labels including [CBS](/wiki/Sony_Music#Columbia/CBS_Records), [KAPP](/wiki/Kapp_Records) and [MCA](/wiki/MCA_Records). Life's recording artists have included [Teresa Teng](/wiki/Teresa_Teng) and [Frances Yip](/wiki/Frances_Yip). In this year, the factory in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) started production. The [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) subsidiary was chaired by millionaire [Aw Cheng Chye](/wiki/Aw_Cheng_Chye) at that time, the parent company was chaired by Ng Lian Chin ([simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 黄连振; [traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 黃連振) and Life Records (Hong Kong) was exported to [United Kingdom](/wiki/United_Kingdom) and [United States](/wiki/United_States). Life Records (Hong Kong) started to produce [cassette tape](/wiki/Cassette_tape) that recorded directly from the original master recording. ## Artists - [Teresa Teng (鄧麗君)](/wiki/Teresa_Teng) - [Frances Yip (葉麗儀)](/wiki/Frances_Yip) - You Ya (尤雅) - Qing Shan (青山) - Lee Yee (李逸) - Li Ya Ping (李亞萍) - Yang Xiao Ping (楊小萍) - Elaine Kang (江梦蕾) - [Huang Qing Yuan (黃清元)](/wiki/Huang_Qing_Yuan) - Kang Qiao (康乔) - Xie Lei (謝雷) - Mimi Gan (顏秋霞) - [Rebecca Pan (潘迪華)](/wiki/Rebecca_Pan) - Tam Soon Chern (譚順成) - [Mary Xie (謝玲玲)](/wiki/Tse_Ling-ling) - Lisa Wong (麗莎) - [Vansalrang (萬沙浪)](/wiki/Wan_Sha_Lang) - Chew Chin Yuin (邱清雲) - Wong Foong Foong (黃鳳鳳) - [Yao Su Jung (姚苏蓉)](/wiki/Yao_Su-jung) - Wong Shiau Chuen (黄晓君) - [Broery Marantika](/wiki/Broery) - Official website[*dead link*] This article about an Asian record label is a stub.
